keyword: how many calories in a jolly rancher
title: How Many Calories in a Jolly Rancher?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a jolly rancher, including carbs, sugars, and full nutrition breakdown per piece for quick reference.
h1: How Many Calories in a Jolly Rancher?
assumptions: Standard hard candy piece (~3.5 g), original flavors like watermelon or grape, no wrapper.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by flavor, batch, and manufacturer; values are approximate. Check packaging for exact details.

quick_answer.text: A single Jolly Rancher contains about 24 calories, primarily from sugars.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Jolly Rancher Pop (with stick, larger size)

faqs.q: How many calories in a jolly rancher?
faqs.a: One standard Jolly Rancher has about 24 calories.

faqs.q: Are Jolly Ranchers high in sugar?
faqs.a: Yes, each piece contains 5 g of sugars out of 6 g total carbs.

faqs.q: Do Jolly Ranchers have fat or protein?
faqs.a: No fat or protein; all calories come from carbohydrates.

faqs.q: How many calories in a bag of Jolly Ranchers?
faqs.a: A typical 3.5 oz bag (about 14 pieces) has around 336 calories.

faqs.q: What's the difference in calories for different Jolly Rancher flavors?
faqs.a: Most flavors are similar at 24 kcal per piece, with minor variations.
